desc: Balanced Bath and Body utilizes a unique blend of skin safe ingredients developed by a high school chemistry teacher to offer safe alternatives for bath bombs containing artificial dyes and chemical imbalances. These relaxing bath bombs offer the soothing qualities of essential oils with skin friendly ingredients.

layout.text: Bath Bombs designed with the skin in mind.
Our holistic, pH balanced bath bombs are made with all natural clays in place of toxic artificial colorants, and are chalk full of your favorite therapeutic grade essential oils.
